    Description
    BoardController
    The BoardController class is responsible for managing the GUI scene of the game board.
    ChatController
    This class is responsible for managing the chat functionality in the GUI.
    DisconnectionErrorSceneController
    This class is responsible for controlling the disconnection error scene in the GUI.
    EnterGameSceneController
    This class class is responsible for controlling the enter game scene in the GUI.
    GuiController
    The GuiController class is an abstract class that serves as the base class for all GUI scene controllers.
    LobbyController
    this class is responsible for controlling the lobby scene in the GUI.
    LoginSceneController
    The LoginSceneController class is responsible for controlling the login scene in the GUI.
    ObjectiveCardController
    This class is responsible for controlling the objective card scene in the GUI.
    OtherShelvesController
    The OtherShelvesController class is responsible for controlling the scene displaying the shelves of other players in the GUI.
    PlayerNumSceneController
    This class is responsible for controlling the player number selection scene in the GUI.
    StageController
    This class represents the current stage used to play the game.
    WaitingRoomController
    This class is responsible for controlling the waiting room scene in the GUI.
    WinSceneController
    This class is responsible for controlling the win scene in the GUI.
